description: Gubns partners with Of Architecture to host an open studio, pop-up and talk, showcasing a curated exhibition of works by architect-makers alongside a studio tour led by Of co-founders James Mak and Jongwon Na.

factsheet.heading: About
paragraphs: Gubns is a global collective of architect-makers turning to the craftsâ€”a group dedicated to celebrating the diversity of talent within the built environment.

Studio Of is an architecture studio working in London and Seoul. Led by James Mak and Jongwon Na, the team operates across scales and sectors, collaborating with clients ranging from public institutions, charities, to developers, designers and private individuals.

For Open House Festival,  Gubns partners with Studio Of to hose an office tour and pop-up exhibition. The tour will be led by James and Jongwon while the curated pop-up while comprise of objects designed by Gubns' community of architect-makers.

location.address: Reliance Wharf, Hertford Road, Unit B, N1 5ET

name: Gubns Open Studio No.6: Of Architecture
